Name: Aiga-i-le-Tai
Description: Located on the western side of Samoa, Aiga-i-le-Tai is known for its beautiful beaches and traditional Samoan villages.

Name: Apia
Description: Apia is the capital city and cultural heart of Samoa, located on the island of Upolu. It s known for its historical sites and vibrant local culture.

Name: Vaa-o-Fonoti
Description: A region located on the southern coast of Samoa, Vaa-o-Fonoti is famous for its cultural heritage and scenic landscapes.

Name: Tofa Toloa
Description: A small region of Samoa, known for its agricultural practices, rainforests, and rural way of life.

Name: Savaii
Description: Savaii is the largest island in Samoa and is known for its volcanic landscapes, pristine beaches, and traditional villages.
